text: Click here for Jr Research Fellow Post Details JNU Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 98 Teaching Posts: Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) has published notification for the recruitment of 98 Professor, Associate Professor & Assistant Professor vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online on or before 14-03-2017 at 05:30 pm. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. JNU Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 98 Name of the Post: 2. Associate Professor: 38 Posts 3. Assistant Professor: 26 Posts Educational Qualification: Candidates should have An eminent scholar with Ph.D qualification(s) in the concerned/allied/relevant discipline and published work of high quality, actively engaged in research with evidence of published work with a minimum of 10 publications books and/or research/policy papers for POst No. 01, Good academic record with a Ph.D. Degree in the concerned/allied/relevant discipline and Master’s Degree with at least 55% marks (or an equivalent grade in a point scale wherever grading system is followed for Post No. 02 & Good academic record as defined by the concerned university with at least 55% marks (or an equivalent grade in point scale wherever grading system is followed) at the Master’s Degree level in a relevant subject from an Indian University, or an equivalent degree from an accredited foreign university with NET/ SLET/ SET Qualification for Post No. 03 with relevant experience. Selection Process : Candidates will be selected based on interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 500/- for General and OBC Candidates. No fee for SC/ ST/ PWD and Women candidates. For more fee details refer the notification. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.jnu.ac.in on or before 14-03-2017 at 05:30 pm. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Candidates log on the website www.jnu.ac.in 2. Select the desired post & Click on Apply Online 3. Read all instructions & fill all the details 4. Check once before submit the form 5. Now take a print of online application for future use Last Date to Apply Online: 14-03-2017 at 05:30 pm. For more details like pay scale, experience, reservation, duration & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Apply Online JNU Recruitment 2017 – Research Associate, Asst & JRF Posts: Centre for the Study of Regional Development, School of Social Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Research Associate, Research Assistant & Junior Research Fellow vacancies for the project entitled “Preparation of Tribal Atlas for 177 Districts of India”on temporary basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed format on or before 10-03-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… JNU Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 05 Name of the Posts: 1. Research Associate: 01 Post 2. Junior Research Fellow: 03 Posts 3. Research Assistant: 01 Post Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess PhD in Geography for S.No-1, M.A. in Geography / Social Sciences for S.No-2, Graduation in any discipline, preference will be given to the candidate having knowledge of Accounts for S.No-3 Posts. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their CV to Prof. Kaushal Kumar Sharma (kaushalkumar@mail.jnu.ac.in), Room No-444, Centre for the Study of Regional Development, School of Social Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi – 110067 on or before 10-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 10-03-2017 For more details like fellowship & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt – JNU Recruitment 2017 – Junior Research Fellow Posts: Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU), New Delhi has published a notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow vacancies on temporary basis in the SERB-DST funded project entitled “Characterization of candidate homeobox gene associated regulatory network involved in abiotic stress responses” at School of Computational & Integrative Sciences. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed format on or before 08-03-2017. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… JNU Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Junior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess M.Sc Degree (with minimum of 55% marks) or equivalent in Life Sciences/ Biotechnology/ Bioinformatics/ Molecular Biology or any other related field with relevant research experience. Selection Process: Shortlisted candidates will be called for interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their complete application in prescribed format along with attested copies of the certificates & proof of research experience (if any) to the Dr. Mukesh Jain, Associate Professor, School of Computational & Integrative Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi-110067 on or before 08-03-2017. The envelope must be superscribed by “Application for the Post of JRF”. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 08-03-2017. For more details like fellowship & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Application Form JNU Recruitment 2017 – Jr Research Fellow Posts: School of Environmental Sciences Remote Sensing Applications in Geosciences Laboratory, Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) has published notification for the recruitment of Junior Research Fellow vacancies for the project titled “Study of the identification of unique morphological features on the polar lunar surfaces” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 15-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. JNU Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Junior Research Fellow Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess MTech/ M.Phil with NET/ GATE or equivalent qualification with more than 75% marks throughout. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application with detailed CV to the Prof. S. Mukherjee, PI (Chandrayaan Project) Dean, School of Environmental Sciences, Jawaharlal Nehru University (Email: saumitramukherjee3@gmail.com) on or before 15-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 15-03-2017 For more details like emolument, experience, desirable qualification & other information click on the link given below….
